email.label: Email Address
email.successDescription: Redirecting to the external links optimizer
email.errorDescription: Please try again or contact an administrator.
email.invalidEmailDescription: Please enter a valid email address

verifyRequest.title: Check Your Email
verifyRequest.description: We've sent a login link to your email
verifyRequest.checkSpam: If you don't receive the email, please check your spam folder.

hero.title: External Links API Parameters
hero.description: All requests use POST + JSON and must include the `x-token` header. Use the following reference to integrate the API from any environment.

requirements.contentType: Always set to `application/json` to send the body as JSON.
requirements.token: Request token copied from the Keys page.

body.title: JSON Body Fields
body.description: `blacklist` and `preferredSites` accept arrays or comma-separated strings. The server deduplicates automatically.

fields.email: Authorized email that has already been registered in the admin portal.
fields.text: English text that should be analyzed for external link recommendations.
fields.fingerprint: Optional identifier used for anonymous visitor rate limiting.
fields.blacklist: Domains to exclude. Accepts an array or comma-separated string.
fields.preferredSites: Domains to prioritize in the final results. Accepts an array or comma-separated string.

usage.title: How to Send Requests
usage.description: Make sure the email matches the token; otherwise the API responds with UNAUTHORIZED.

prepare.title: Prepare email & token
prepare.description: After adding an email in the admin console, click “View key” to copy the x-token bound to that address.

build.title: Build the request
build.description: Include `email` and `text` in the JSON body and send Content-Type plus x-token headers from Postman, curl, or any HTTP client.

handle.title: Handle the response
handle.description: Successful responses return `keywords`, `usage`, and optional `linkFetchError`. Failures include an `error.code` describing auth, rate limits, or provider issues.

example.title: Complete Request Example
example.description: Replace `YOUR_DOMAIN`, `YOUR_X_TOKEN`, and other placeholders before running in Postman or curl.

response.title: Response Fields
response.description: When `success=false`, the `error` object provides the exact failure reason.

fields.success: Boolean indicating whether the request succeeded.
fields.reason: Reason this external link is recommended.
fields.title: Primary link title.
fields.linkFetchError: Error message from link fetching, or `null` on success.

keys.title: API Credentials
keys.description: Copy the authorized email and x-token pair required for Elink API calls.
keys.tokenHelper: Send this token in the `x-token` header for every API call.
keys.empty: No token has been issued for this email yet. Please contact an administrator.
keys.helper: All API calls only need this email plus the x-token header. Keep the token private.

card.title: Top Up Balance
card.description: Top up your balance for the selected email. The credit will be used to pay for Elink API usage.

form.emailHelperEditable: If you are not logged in, please provide the email that should own this balance and API key.
form.emailHelperFixed: The system will use your logged-in email.
form.amountHelper: ¥{amount} will be charged and added to your balance.
form.paymentMethodHint: Choose the wallet that matches the QR code you will scan.

toast.createdDescription: Scan the QR code in the popup to complete the payment.
toast.expiredDescription: The payment order has expired. Please create a new one.
toast.failedDescription: The payment could not be completed. Please create a new order.

payment.title: Scan to Pay
payment.description: Use your mobile wallet to scan the QR code and complete the payment.
payment.instructionsGeneric: Keep this window open until the payment is confirmed.
payment.instructionsAlipay: Open Alipay on your phone and scan this QR code.
payment.instructionsWxpay: Open WeChat, tap the “+” button and choose “Scan” to pay.

admin.title: Admin Console
admin.description: Manage API access keys and balances.

accessKeys.title: Issued Keys
accessKeys.empty: No keys yet. Click "Add Key" to create one.

dialog.createDescription: Enter an email address. A key will be generated automatically.
dialog.hint: Keys are stored hashed. Please copy the plaintext after creation.
dialog.editDescription: Changing the email regenerates the key immediately.
dialog.viewDescription: The key is derived from the email. Copy it when needed.

pricing.title: Token Pricing
pricing.description: Set how much users are charged for every 1,000 tokens consumed.

toast.errorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
toast.invalid: Please enter a valid number greater than 0.
toast.unauthorized: You do not have permission to change pricing.

orphan.title: Top-up Only Emails
orphan.description: These emails have a balance but no issued key yet.
